Translations.Text: An la bi bu she you yi wu pei zhu de zui'e, ta wei ziji suo yiyu de ren she you bi zhe cha yi deng de zuiguo, shei yi wu pei zhu, shei yi shen xian mi wule
Chu an la wai, tamen zhi qidao nushen, zhi qidao wu shan de emo
Yuan an la qi jue ta! Ta shuo:“Wo biding yao cong ni de puren zhong zhanyou yiding de shuliang

wo bi shi tamen mi wu, bi shi tamen wangxiang, bi mingling tamen gelie shengchu de erduo, bi mingling tamen biangeng an la de suo zaowu.” Shei she an la er yi emo wei zhuzai, shei que yi zaoshou mingxian de kui she
Ta yingxu tamen, bing shi tamen wangxiang——emo zhi wei youhuo er yingxu tamen——
zhe deng ren de guisu shi huo yu, tamen wu chu taobi
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, wo jiang shi tamen ru yu xia lin zhu he de leyuan, er yong ju qizhong. An la de yingxu shi zhenshi de. Yanyu fangmian, shei bi an la geng chengshi ne

(Ta de yingxu), bushi jie nimen de wangxiang keyi huode de, ye bushi jie xinfeng tian jing zhe de wangxiang keyi huode de. Shei zuo'e, shei shou e bao, chu an la wai, ta buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe baohu zhe, he renhe yuanzhu zhe
xinshi hexin nu, shei xingshan, shei de ru leyuan, tamen bu shou sihao de kui wang
Quanti guishun an la, qie leshanhaoshi, bing zunshou chongzheng de yi bo la xin de zongjiao de ren, zongjiao fangmian, you shei bi ta geng youmei ne? An la ceng ba yi bo la xin dangzuo zhijiao
Tiandi wanwu, zhishi an la de. An la shi zhouzhi wanwu de
